subject: Vam and Vam Pro
description_text:
Hi, is the power supply for the VAM and the VAM Pro the exact same? I have
VAM atm but want to upgrade to Vam Pro because Simhub has integration with
the vampros and I can't run the vams at higher hz like simhub wants, can
you tell me if the two power supplies are the same?

conversations.body_text: Hi BadDadGames,  Hello, VAM and VAM Pro use the same power supply model. Additionally, since VAM operates in a “rotate–pause–rotate–pause” motion pattern, its movement frequency is indeed lower than the reciprocating motion frequency of the VAM Pro linear motor.
